page.title: 14 A Day With a Fisherman
page.content: On Monday the 19th of May(1985)I went on a day fishing trip with one of Seaton's fishermen, called Mr.Ziemann. We started from Axmouth Harbour at 6.40am! Mr.Ziemann took the boat about 5 miles out to sea to a place called Witches Way and at 7.50am he started to trawl for fish.At 9.00am the trawl caught on a big rock on the sea bed so Mr.Ziemann brought the trawl up.Inside were fish,crabs and one lobster. Mr.Ziemann put back into the sea all the fish and crabs that were too small, he then put the trawl back into the sea. At 12.05pm the trawl was brought in again, he put the small fish and crabs back into the sea again and began trawling once more. At 1.35pm Mr.Ziemann started preparing the fish for sale and fish for crab pots.
